documentation.text:
@dev get latest network fee data + expiry timestamp
   conclude network fee campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao

@dev return latest burn/reward/rebate data, also affecting epoch + expiry timestamp
     conclude brr campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao
@dev  return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch
@dev return latest network fee and expiry timestamp
@dev return latest brr result, conclude brr campaign if needed

@dev  helper func to get encoded reward and rebate
      revert if validation failed

   conclude network fee campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao

@dev return latest burn/reward/rebate data, also affecting epoch + expiry timestamp
     conclude brr campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao
@dev  return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch
@dev return latest network fee and expiry timestamp
@dev return latest brr result, conclude brr campaign if needed

@dev  helper func to get encoded reward and rebate
      revert if validation failed

devdoc.details: Network fee campaign: options are fee in bps     BRR fee handler campaign: options are combined of rebate (left most 128 bits) + reward (right most 128 bits)     General campaign: options are from 1 to num_options

cancelCampaign(uint256).details: cancel a campaign with given id, called by daoOperator only      only can cancel campaigns that have not started yet

params.campaignID: id of the campaign to cancel

getCampaignWinningOptionAndValue(uint256.details: return campaign winning option and its value     return (0, 0) if campaign does not exist     return (0, 0) if campaign has not ended yet     return (0, 0) if campaign has no winning option based on the formula

params.campaignID: id of campaign to get result

getCurrentEpochRewardPercentageInPrecisi.details: return staker's reward percentage in precision for the current epoch

getDataFromRewardAndRebateWithValidation.details: helper func to get encoded reward and rebate      revert if validation failed

getLatestBRRData().details: return latest brr result, conclude brr campaign if needed

getLatestBRRDataWithCache().details: return latest burn/reward/rebate data, also affecting epoch + expiry timestamp     conclude brr campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao

getLatestNetworkFeeData().details: return latest network fee and expiry timestamp

getLatestNetworkFeeDataWithCache().details: get latest network fee data + expiry timestamp   conclude network fee campaign if needed and caching latest result in KyberDao

getPastEpochRewardPercentageInPrecision(.details: return staker's reward percentage in precision for a past epoch only      fee handler should call this function when a staker wants to claim reward      return 0 if staker has no votes or stakes

handleWithdrawal(address,uint256).details: called by staking contract when staker wanted to withdraw

params.reduceAmount: amount voting power to be reduced for each campaign staker has voted at this epoch
params.staker: address of staker to reduce reward

shouldBurnRewardForEpoch(uint256).details: some epochs have reward but no one can claim, for example: epoch 0     return true if should burn all that reward

params.epoch: epoch to check for burning reward

submitNewCampaign(uint8,uint256,uint256,.details: create new campaign, only called by daoOperator

params.cInPrecision: c value (in precision) for formula to conclude campaign
params.minPercentageInPrecision: min percentage (in precision) for formula to conclude campaign
params.options: list values of options to vote for this campaign
params.startTimestamp: timestamp to start running the campaign
params.tInPrecision: t value (in precision) for formula to conclude campaign

vote(uint256,uint256).details: vote for an option of a campaign      options are indexed from 1 to number of options

params.campaignID: id of campaign to vote for
params.option: id of options to vote for

userdoc.notice: This contract is using SafeMath for uint, which is inherited from EpochUtils Some events are moved to interface, easier for public uses
